TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OutputCacheSettingsSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class OutputCacheSettingsSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 配置应用程序页的输出缓存设置。

span.span: Configures the output cache settings for application pages .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类允许你以编程方式访问和修改`outputCacheSettings`元素`caching`配置文件中的部分。The class allows you to programmatically access and modify the `outputCacheSettings` element of the `caching` section in a configuration file. 输出缓存设置定义的依赖项 (存储在缓存中，文件、 缓存键的项之间的关系或对象)，用于输出缓存，例如，通过[@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)指令或通过。The output cache settings define the dependencies (the relationships between items stored in the cache and files, cache keys, or objects) that are used in output caching, for instance, by the [@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive or by the . > [!NOTE] > 可以将信息写入根据定义的部分属性的限制的配置文件的相关节其值是。The can write information into the related section of the configuration file according to the restrictions defined by the section property whose value is . 在层次结构不允许层次结构中的配置文件中写入任何尝试会对由分析器生成的错误消息中。Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a level not allowed in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser. 但是，此类可用于读取层次结构中的任何级别的配置信息。However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取从现有的 Web 应用程序的配置文件的对象。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection/CS/OutputCacheSettingsSection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection/VB/OutputCacheSettingsSection.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用的。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 获取实例类通过方法。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OutputCacheProfiles As OutputCacheProfileCollection

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您以编程方式访问`outputCacheProfiles`配置文件中的元素。The property allows you to programmatically access the `outputCacheProfiles` element in a configuration file. 你可以使用属性修改`outputCacheProfiles`元素以编程方式。You can use the property to modify the `outputCacheProfiles` element programmatically. `outputCacheProfiles`部分包含对象，后者表示输出缓存可能会使用的应用程序中的页的设置。The `outputCacheProfiles` section contains objects that represent output cache settings that may be used by pages in the application. 这些设置可以通过设置应用于页`CacheProfile`属性[@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)指令。These settings can be applied to a page by setting the `CacheProfile` attribute of the [@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive. 将配置文件应用到控件缓存属性，如依赖关系、 缓存位置中，和缓存到期时间。Apply the profile to control caching attributes such as dependencies, cache location, and cache expiration time. [@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)指令可以重写包含的所有设置除属性。The [@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive can override all the settings contained by an except the property. 这是为了确保可以启用或禁用而无需修改可能已重写的所有页中的指令。This is to ensure you can enable or disable the without having to modify the directives in all the pages that might have overridden it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection/CS/OutputCacheSettingsSection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection/VB/OutputCacheSettingsSection.vb#3)]
